title: People of India, This our young generation. Advocating for their fav. by abusing their own families & player/actor families.
selftext:
I too follow many people, actors, sportsman etc. But I'm not blind & brainwashed enough to do this bulshit on twitter or anyother platform. 

https://preview.redd.it/ewms5ogucnqa1.png?width=1072&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=a932743c9d956124ac5dc7b6a713bf62ff10c2d3

https://preview.redd.it/bn9tgjgucnqa1.png?width=990&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=bdb8e096331ae084534e3e8f45c9c6d9bfc15a1b

https://preview.redd.it/aly6vhgucnqa1.png?width=1444&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=8eba88a339b58cade582acb060497e8746c57f3c
comments:
Teenagers srk - kohli  ke fan nahi hai balki srk - kohli unki poori duniya hai. Abhi uu log bacha hai jisko lagta hai usko sab kuch pta hai lekin ghanta kuch nhi pta hai real world ke baare me. Internet par uu log ko equal voice mil gya hai to apne gods(celebrities) ko defend kar rha. 
Jyada load mat lo memes dekho khus raho. And ee baat yaad rakho ki uu log bacha hai maaf kar do baad me khud bda hoga to yeh sab chiz khud cringe lagega.
